description: This file defines a React component 'RecipeDetailPage' that displays detailed information about a recipe, including an image, title, and a save action. It manages data fetching via an API, handles user interactions such as saving a recipe, and navigates between pages.

methods.name: RecipeDetailPage()
methods.description: React functional component for displaying detailed recipe view, handling loading state, saving, and navigation.

methods.name: onSave
methods.description: Handles saving the recipe, including user authentication check, API call, and UI feedback.
